snippet: Also lifting stocks was the strong acceptance by private creditors of Greece’s bond swap offer, but gains were held in check.
abstract: Stocks close with modest gains after the government’s monthly report on employment bolsters hopes that the economic recovery is on track; gains are tempered by news that a big debt write-down by Greece could cause significant losses for some banks.
lead_paragraph: Also lifting stocks was the strong acceptance by private creditors of Greece’s bond swap offer, but gains were held in check.

headline.seo: Markets Slightly Higher After Jobs Report
headline.main: Shares Rise on Jobs Report But End With Slight Gains
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise on Jobs Report But End With Slight Gains
